summary: Hiya folks, I'm in need of some serious assistance. I need a fic found. So, it's this HP fic I read years ago. Yes, it was a...
body: Hiya folks, I’m in need of some serious assistance. I need a fic found. So, it’s this HP fic I read years ago. Yes, it was a long time ago but, I still have this need to reread it. It’s one of those fics where Hermione finds out she’s Bellatrix and Rodolphus Lestrange’s daughter. And like Bellatrix had been forced to give up Hermione when Voldy lost the first time, (I think Dumbledore put Hermione with the Grangers). And now Bellatrix insists that Hermione be transferred to Slytherin. Something like that. Please, help me find this fic. I’ve spemd hours looking for it. I can’t find it in my AO3 history. Thanks fam. If you wouldn’t mind, please tag my user, thanks again you lot. 💗

tags: lmao idk i took some medicine the other day
and i wished it worked faster
and this popped into my head
summary: I've had this thought stuck in my head the last two days where harry, ron & hermione are somewhere and Ron has like a headache...
body:
I’ve had this thought stuck in my head the last two days where harry, ron & hermione are somewhere and Ron has like a headache or something and idk why but they don’t have the ability to magically cure Ron’s headache

And it goes like,


“Here, take this.” Harry says, handing Ron two pills.

“What is it?” Ron asks.

“It’s ibuprofen,” Hermione answers, “it’s a pain reliever.”

“Oh, good!” Ron says as he pops the pills back and chews them, immediately gagging and trying to spit it out.

“You’re supposed to just swallow them.” Harry informs him to late, a ghost of a smile present.

“Well, they didn’t work anyway, my head still hurts.” Ron says after taking a drink of water.

“It takes a little while for the medicine to work.” Hermione says taking the glass.

“Why?”

Hermione and Harry share a look.

“Dunno, just does.” Harry says with a shrug.

“That’s stupid.” Ron says to no disagreement.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

tags: Harry Potter and the Goblet of fire
summary: Okay, I'm not sure if someone has already talked about this, but what if the tenth Doctor just showed up at the set of  Harry...
body: Okay, I’m not sure if someone has already talked about this, but what if the tenth Doctor just showed up at the set of Harry Potter and the Goblet of fire and someone mistook him for David and had him do the scenes of Barry Crouch Jr.? I mean can you imagine the look on his face when someone calls him David?

reblog.comment: Okay, I’m not sure if someone has already talked about this, but what if the tenth Doctor just showed up at the set of Harry Potter and the Goblet of fire and someone mistook him for David and had him do the scenes of Barry Crouch Jr.? I mean can you imagine the look on his face when someone calls him David?

tags: i've reread twlight a hundred times xd
draco is the kind of person who reads bad romance and hide it
summary:
Harry: What are you reading?
Draco *hiding hurriedly a book*: Nothing!
Harry *picks up the book*: Twilight? Isn't it a bit......
body:
Harry: What are you reading?
Draco *hiding hurriedly a book*: Nothing!
Harry *picks up the book*: Twilight? Isn't it a bit... ridiculous?
Draco: If you don't believe that a hundred year old vampyre can found love in a clumsy teenager is your problem, you antiromance bastard!

dialogue.name: Harry *picks up the book*
dialogue.label: Harry *picks up the book*:
dialogue.phrase: Twilight? Isn't it a bit... ridiculous?

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: If you don't believe that a hundred year old vampyre can found love in a clumsy teenager is your problem, you antiromance bastard!

blog.description: I'm Jaxon, I'm a beginner kitchen/green witch. Pisces sun, Taurus moon, Aquarius rising. I worship life and Nature and it's helped me discover and love myself. I have a magical, free-spirited daughter called Emma and we aim to travel the world.

summary:
I GOT. THE. COOLEST. HARRY POTTER SHIRT.
SO ITS GOT THE WHOMPING WILLOW ON IT OK LIKE SO:
AND THE PERSON WHO GAVE IT TO ME WAS...
body:
LOOK HERE, BITCHES

I GOT. THE. COOLEST. HARRY POTTER SHIRT.


SO ITS GOT THE WHOMPING WILLOW ON IT OK LIKE SO:



AND THE PERSON WHO GAVE IT TO ME WAS LIKE “it glo in the dark”


SO YA HOMIE IS EXPECTING THE MOON AND STARS TO GLOW AROUND THE FUCKENING TREE, RITE?


NO.


ITS THE GOD FREAKIN DARNED PATRONUS/ANIMAGUS OF THE MARAUDERS. THAT GLO.




THE OGs, YALL.


EXCUSE ME WHILE I UGLY CRY.


#BLESSED.
